org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Class AeProcessStateConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeAbstractStorage
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeProcessStateConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeProcessStateConnection
public class AeProcessStateConnection
extends AeAbstractStorage
implements IAeProcessStateConnection

A delegating implementation of a process state connection. This class delegates all of the database calls to an instance of IAeProcessStateConnectionDelegate. The purpose of this class is to encapsulate storage 'logic' so that it can be shared across multiple storage implementations (such as SQL and Tamino).
